name: Demon Summoning Torch
tooltip:
Demon Summoning Torch
Item Level 1
Quest Item
Unique
Use: Place the torch in the mouth of High Chief Winterfall's cave to summon the demon that is corrupting the Winterfall furbolgs.  Bring some friends before planting it... (10 Min Cooldown)
"A shamanistic device fashioned by the Timbermaw to summon forth corrupting demons."
